item.title: Hello World
item.description:
💥💥💥

Sau rất nhiều công phu mày mò với cháu Hugo, thì cuối cùng cũng tìm được theme ưng ý là Stack của Jimmy Cai, cùng với bộ starter kit ko thể kỹ hơn https://github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack-starter

Thanks Hugo and Jimmy

item.title: Links
item.description: <!-- To use this feature, add `links` section to frontmatter. This page's frontmatter: ```yaml links: - title: GitHub description: GitHub is the world's largest software development platform. website: https://github.com image: https://github.githubassets.com/images/modules/logos_page/GitHub-Mark.png - title: TypeScript description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. website: https://www.typescriptlang.org image: ts-logo-128.jpg ``` `image` field accepts both local and external images. -->
